title: Back To School: Uniforms Edition
description: Back to School: Uniforms Edition is a fun beauty dress-up game that lets you dress for school success. Spin a wheel to unlock school uniforms from all around the world, like Japan, the U.S., the U.K., India, France, and South Korea. Dress up your character with just the right outfits and dazzle them up with accessories and hairstyles inspired by each culture. Discover the unique styles of school uniforms worldwide and express your fashion creativity.
